errorCooldown.title: Hang Tight! ⏳
errorCooldown.description: It looks like you need to wait <slot_0> before you can use that command again. Don’t worry, we’ll be ready soon!

hasOcurredAnError.title: 🚨 An error occurred!
hasOcurredAnError.description: It seems that an error occurred while executing the command. Please contact the owner bot or report the error.

errorFoundService.title: 🚨 Service not found!
errorFoundService.description: It seems that the service <slot_0> was not found. This was probably caused by a change in the bot code.

errorPermissionBot.title: 🔒 Access Denied
errorPermissionBot.description: It seems the bot does not have the necessary permissions to execute this <slot_0>. Please check the permissions and make sure they are enabled.

errorAccessScope.title: 🔒 Access Denied
errorAccessScope.description: It seems you do not have access to this <slot_0>. Please contact the owner bot for access to this feature.
